items.sentence: I believe we have a staff meeting scheduled for 2:30.
I asked Tom not to tell my parents what had happened.
What\'s your favorite way to stay cool in the summer?
It isn\'t much fun just sitting here waiting for Tom.
Tom committed suicide by jumping in front of a train.
Tom didn\'t believe Mary when she said she loved him.
Tom didn\'t buy the dress Mary wanted him to buy her.
Tom didn\'t deny that he was the one who killed Mary.
Tom didn\'t do any of the work he was supposed to do.
Tom and Mary spend as much time together as they can.
Tom and Mary were able to figure it out on their own.
Tom and his friends played hockey on the frozen pond.
He made up his mind to jog in spite of his blindness.
No one else noticed that Tom had snuck into the room.
I can\'t believe I let you talk me into volunteering.
Only the fools and the dead never change their minds.
Tell Tom that I\'m going to do that as soon as I can.
The first stage of the mission has been accomplished.
I think you should do everything Tom tells you to do.
You were supposed to be with Tom yesterday afternoon.
